title: Vehicle hit by train on level crossing in Kodikamam
body_lines: Three members of the same family who were travelling in a vehicle have been hit by a train in the area of Kodikamam in Jaffna.
According to reports, two sons and the father had been inside the vehicle at the time of the accident.
The Yaldevi express train had collided with the vehicle that attempted to cross the railway line in a careless manner.
